title: Riot please implement an option to make the client faster
body:
It literally takes me more than 10 seconds after clicking the button to access something on this client (e.g. profile, collection, shops) it is so infuriating. 

And its not just me as well, many people have been complaining about this lag but you guys seem to always dismiss it. Yes I know that there is a low spec mode but it literally does jack shit and the client is still laggy af.

Please riot. It's just a goddamn client. Why does it lag 20 times more than the actual game? It's ridiculous.
